netflix.name: Netflix Gift Card
netflix.description: Stream your favorite shows and movies with Netflix gift cards. Perfect for entertainment lovers who want access to thousands of movies and TV series.

amazon.name: Amazon Gift Card
amazon.description: Shop for anything on Amazon with these versatile gift cards. From electronics to books, clothing to home goods - Amazon has it all.

steam.name: Steam Gift Card
steam.description: Unlock thousands of PC games with Steam gift cards. Perfect for gamers who want access to the latest titles and indie games.

starbucks.name: Starbucks Gift Card
starbucks.description: Enjoy your favorite coffee and treats with Starbucks gift cards. Perfect for coffee lovers and convenient for daily caffeine fixes.

playstation.name: PlayStation Gift Card
playstation.description: Access games, DLC, and PlayStation Plus subscriptions. Essential for PlayStation gamers who want to expand their gaming library.

spotify.name: Spotify Gift Card
spotify.description: Enjoy millions of songs, podcasts, and playlists with Spotify Premium. Perfect for music lovers who want ad-free listening.

target.name: Target Gift Card
target.description: Shop for everything you need at Target with these versatile gift cards. From groceries to home goods, clothing to electronics.

xbox.name: Xbox Gift Card
xbox.description: Enhance your Xbox gaming experience with gift cards for games, DLC, and Xbox Game Pass subscriptions.

roblox.name: Roblox Digital Gift Card
roblox.description: The easiest way to add Robux (Robloxâ€™s digital currency) to your account. Use Robux to deck out your avatar and unlock additional perks in your favorite Roblox experiences.
